name: Wellness Center
description: Homeless Prenatal Program’s (HPP) Wellness Center provides groups, classes and one-on-one support to encourage healthy pregnancies and birth outcomes, while promoting bonding and parenting skills in service of healthy child development. The Wellness Center offers a holistic and integrated array of services designed to help clients deliver healthy babies, encourage parent + child bonding and acquire parenting skills that promote child development, including prenatal classes, group prenatal care,

howToGetIt: Visit: https://www.homelessprenatal.org/wellness-center for more information and list of classes. If you would like to learn more about Wellness Groups please contact Guadalupe Booze at GuadalupeVBooze@homelessprenatal.org.
